description:
Heidari Law Group, PC, is a personal injury law firm with offices in Nevada and throughout California. Our location here in Sacramento, California, is an important hub for our practice.

Experience

Our law firm has a track record of success with complex injury claims. We have negotiated many million-dollar-plus settlements. Every client we accept gets the benefit of our collective decades of experience.

Knowledge

We also have deep knowledge of a broad range of practice areas. Some of the case types we handle include employment law, car and truck accidents, traumatic brain injury, medical malpractice, birth injury, aviation and mass transportation accidents, wrongful death, construction accidents, premises injury and animal bites. In addition to personal injury, we handle cases involving employment law and civil rights issues.

Communication

We believe that communication is necessary to secure the best possible outcome in any lawsuit. We aim to remain available for our clients, even over the weekend or in the evenings.

We also have the most advanced communication technology available to communicate within our organization. We use the knowledge and experience of all our lawyers to bring their cases to efficient and favorable resolutions.

Accessibility

At Heidari Law Group, PC, we commit to helping the injured. Our law firm charges no upfront attorney fees. We also offer the option for credit-card payments. Finally, new clients can get a free consultation, which includes virtual appointments.
